text: Poppen is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Brent Poppen (born 1973), American wheelchair rugby player, wheelchair tennis player and activist * Claudio Poppen (born 1974), Aruban football player * Christoph Poppen (born 1956), German conductor * Diemut Poppen, German violist ==See also== * Poppens
title: Poppen
